tool_description: Validates URLs for proper format, accessibility, and e-commerce site compatibility before scraping operations.

check_accessibility.description: Whether to test if URL is accessible

error_messages: Invalid URL format: Provide a properly formatted URL starting with http:// or https://
URL not accessible: The provided URL returns an error status code or is unreachable
usage: Provide a URL to validate its format and optionally test accessibility. Use before starting any scraping operations to avoid downstream failures.

is_valid.description: Whether the URL format is valid

is_accessible.description: Whether the URL is accessible (if checked)

status_code.description: HTTP response status code if accessibility was checked
